item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Sakis Pizza -downtown on Waybosset Street near Gourmet Heaven and across the street from Johnson & Wales! One block south from Grants Block and Tazza.

So, I've heard alot about this places from various people. Recently renovated, Sakis is a pizza place downstairs with a nice, large and  well-stocked balcony bar upstairs which looks out to the street and over the restaurant. I've read that the pizza is good, and the reviews from some discerning P-Collective members are in. It seems like a good place to know about and its been requested. So let's check it out! 

PLEASE RSVP - I need to tell them we're coming the Friday before!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be upstairs wearing a silver flower, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Saki's Pizza
